Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in comparison_value: 6
sub comparison_value {
    my ($self, $val) = @_;
    $val = [] if not defined($val);
    my $str = join(',', @{$val});
    return($str);
}
public method configcheckboxlist::convert_newval_source (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in convert_newval_source: 12
sub convert_newval_source {
    my ($self, $newvalsource) = @_;
    my $inlinevarname = WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::Config::inline_var($self->{var});
    my @newvals;
    if($newvalsource =~ /widget/) {
        @newvals = $self->{Module}->{r}->param($newvalsource);
    } else {
        my $newval = eval('$self->{Module}->{r}->{ce}->'. $inlinevarname);
        @newvals = @$newval;
    }
    return(@newvals);
}
public method configcheckboxlist::display_value (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in display_value: 6
sub display_value {
    my ($self, $val) = @_;
    $val = [] if not defined($val);
    my @vals = @$val;
    return join(CGI::br(), @vals);
}
public method configcheckboxlist::entry_widget (  ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in entry_widget: 9
sub entry_widget {
    my ($self, $name, $default) = @_;
    return CGI::checkbox_group(
        -name => $name,
        -value => $self->{values},
        -default => $default,
        -columns=>1
    );
}
public method configcheckboxlist::save_string (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in save_string: 20
sub save_string {
    my ($self, $oldval, $newvalsource) = @_;
    my $varname = $self->{var};
    my @newvals = $self->convert_newval_source($newvalsource);
    if($self->{min} and (scalar(@newvals) < $self->{min})) {
        $self->{Module}->addbadmessage("You need to select at least $self->{min} display mode.");
        if($newvalsource =~ /widget/) {
            return $self->save_string($oldval, 'current'); # try to return the old saved value
        } else {
            return '' ; # the previous saved value was empty, reset to system default
        }
    }
    $oldval = $self->comparison_value($oldval);
    my $newval =  $self->comparison_value(\@newvals);
    return '' if($oldval eq $newval);
    @newvals = map { "'".$_."'" } @newvals;
    my $str = join(',', @newvals);
    $str = '$'. $varname . " = [$str];\n";
    return($str);
}
